this is their plan and their plan is
then to bring down the economy now of
course they don't want to be blamed for

his he keeps telling everyone look at it
and of course as we know the general
public looks at the stock market and
that's how they gauge the economy if the

is fantastic
but what the central bankers have done
is they waited and they waited
and they waited until it was time where
they could say okay the economy has now
moved to trump and what they will do is
then bring it down and if that isn't

to this to have complete distraction on
what is happening here now in the

everyone else is going to tell you how

they keep telling us that sales are

continually seeing bankruptcies in

they told us everything was fantastic
and holiday sales is the best they've
ever seen all of a sudden everyone
started to close up shop we're gonna see
the same thing once again now coming out
of the corporate media they're trying to
convince us that people are spending
like crazy this holiday season now which
is this is very interesting because
wages are down people have less in their

now if people have less in their savings
and people are losing jobs they will
resort to credit cards to purchase the
items and what they're seeing right now
is that people are purchasing on credit
more so than they've ever done before
because they don't have the savings
they'd rather put it on credit and pay
it off so they're purchasing things with
money they don't really have now I know
a lot of people want to give their
family a nice holiday season they don't
want people to think that you know
anything is wrong and this has happens
you know time and time again where
people get embarrassed because it is
embarrassing to lose your job and not
have money to purchase goods for the

good
to make your family members feel good
and everyone wants to feel good during
the holiday season and rent cafe did a

trouble they discovered that in the 50
largest US metropolitan areas
the average renting family will go into
debt due to holiday related expenses and
what they're saying is they will not

what's going to happen during this

ratio and this is pretty non precise and
every time it falls they realize that we
are headed towards a recession and
they're seeing this right now and what

we realize what the corporate media what

like crazy people taking equity loans

of course it's borrowed you feel good
everyone was feeling fantastic
everyone was all-in this is what we are

was incredible it could never go

buildings
I see everything it's it's just
